name: Bringy, Inc.
description: Developer of a mobile insurance application designed to provide end-to-end insurance services instantly with fully digital steps. The company's platform offers insurance for funeral expenses, cancer risks, personal accidents, small businesses, cars, and much more, enabling customers to receive and claim insurance in minutes in an easy, fast, and secure manner.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile insurance application designed to provide end-to-end insurance services instantly with fully digital steps.
